data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Goias needs to be cautious. Paranaense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Paranaense attack but Erick's header doesn't find the target.
Goias have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Paranaense.
Throw-in for Paranaense close to the penalty box.
In the minute 6, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Paranaense throw-in in Goias's half.
Leo Cittadini gets his shot on target but fails to score for Paranaense.
In the minute 10, Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Attention is being given to Goias’s Vinicius Lopes and play has been suspended briefly.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Vinicius Lopes for Goias is back on the field again.
In the minute 12, Carlos Eduardo (Paranaense) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 14, Goias's Fernandao breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Paranaense's Renato Kayzer scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Carlos Eduardo to set up the goal.
In the minute 22, Goias have a dangerous throw-in.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a throw-in for Goias, close to Paranaense's area.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Paranaense at Serra Dourada.
Paranaense's Maycon Nikao gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Paranaense surge into the attack at Serra Dourada but Pedro Henrique’s header is off-target.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Paranaense in Goiania.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Goias a goal kick.
In the minute 28, At Serra Dourada, David Duarte has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Goias drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Can Paranaense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goias's half?
In the minute 32, Paranaense have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Paranaense in Goiania.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Maycon Nikao (Paranaense) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in Goias.
Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In the minute 38, Maycon Nikao for Paranaense drives towards goal at Serra Dourada. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Goias.
Chico for Goias has been booked by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza and receives a first yellow card.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 42, Goal kick for Paranaense at Serra Dourada.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Throw-in for Goias close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Goias.
In the minute 45, In Goiania Goias attack through Vinicius Lopes. The finish is off target, however.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
In Goiania Paranaense drive forward through Carlos Eduardo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Paranaense.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in Goiania.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Paranaense.
The home team have replaced Vinicius Lopes with Shaylon. This is the first substitution made today by Enderson Moreira.
Enderson Moreira (Goias) is making a second substitution, with Sandro replacing Gilberto.
Goias to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Goias are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 51, In Goiania Paranaense drive forward through Leo Cittadini. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 52, Free kick Goias.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Paranaense.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Goias.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
In the minute 58, Free kick Paranaense.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Goias's Juan Pintado breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 63, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Heron is replacing Chico for the home team.
Can Goias capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Paranaense's half?
Fernando Canesin is on a sub for Leo Cittadini for Paranaense.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Goias.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Goias to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Reinaldo is replacing Carlos Eduardo for Paranaense at Serra Dourada.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Goias throw-in in Paranaense's half.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Enderson Moreira is making the team's fourth substitution at Serra Dourada with Rafael Moura replacing Keko.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
In the minute 75, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Rafael Moura (Goias) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Christian is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Paranaense's Christian is back in action after a slight knock.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 78, Goias have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Paranaense at Serra Dourada.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Paranaense push upfield and Thiago Heleno gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Goias defence.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Goias in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 81, The home team replace Ariel Cabral with Gustavo Blanco.
Paulo Autuori (Paranaense) is making a third substitution, with Richard replacing Christian.
Paulo Autuori is making the team's fourth substitution at Serra Dourada with Ze Ivaldo replacing Vinicius Abner.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
In the minute 83, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Goias to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
In the minute 85, Paranaense needs to be cautious. Goias have an attacking throw-in.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juan Pintado is booked for the home team.
In the minute 87, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Goias throw-in in Paranaense's half.
8 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Serra Dourada.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Throw-in for Goias close to the penalty box.
Free kick in a good position for Goias!
Corner awarded to Goias.
Goias are caught offside.
Paranaense have a dangerous throw-in.
Goias needs to be cautious. Paranaense have an attacking throw-in.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goias's Fernandao has been booked in Goiania.
